pages.text: $(o)What would happen if we could give the power of $(l)the Void$() $(o)into a growing larva?$(br2)$(o)This is what Illagers tried to do a long time ago, but sadly there is no information of the result of the experiment.$(br2)You have to insert a Crimson Larva into a Capsid, to obtain a Void Worm. Finally, you have to throw it into the void, so that it absorbs all its power.
